title: Verify Product Search with Filters
objective: To verify that product search returns relevant results and filters work correctly
test_data_required: Product catalog with varied categories and prices
preconditions: Product catalog is populated with test data
At least 50 products across multiple categories

test_steps.expected_result: Homepage loads with search bar visible

test_steps.action: Enter search term 'headphones' in search bar
test_steps.expected_result: Auto-complete suggestions appear showing products and categories

test_steps.action: Press Enter or click Search button
test_steps.expected_result: Search results page loads showing products matching 'headphones'

test_steps.action: Verify search results are relevant (contain 'headphones' in title or description)
test_steps.expected_result: All displayed products are headphones or related audio products

test_steps.action: Verify result count is displayed (e.g., '45 results found')
test_steps.expected_result: Result count shown at top of page
Results update to show only products within price range, result count updates
Results further filtered to show only wireless headphones in price range

test_steps.action: Apply rating filter: 4 stars and above
test_steps.expected_result: Only products with rating >= 4.0 are displayed

test_steps.action: Change sort order to 'Price: Low to High'
test_steps.expected_result: Products re-sorted with lowest priced items first

test_steps.action: Verify all applied filters are displayed as chips/tags with remove option
test_steps.expected_result: Active filters shown as removable chips above results
All filters removed, results return to initial search results for 'headphones'
System suggests 'Did you mean: headphones?' and shows headphone results

test_steps.action: Verify search performance: Note response time

test_execution_history.notes: Search functionality working well, average response time: 280ms

notes: Also test: empty search results, special characters, very long search terms, multiple filter combinations
